ud2.7:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
ud2.7:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena annatarassa upasakassa ekaputtako piyo manapo kalankato hoti.
ud2.7:2.1: Atha kho sambahula upasaka allavattha allakesa diva divassa yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinne kho te upasake bhagava etadavoca:
ud2.7:2.2: “kim nu kho tumhe, upasaka, allavattha allakesa idhupasankamanta diva divassa”ti?
ud2.7:3.1: Evam vutte, so upasako bhagavantam etadavoca:
ud2.7:3.2: “mayham kho, bhante, ekaputtako piyo manapo kalankato.
ud2.7:3.3: Tena mayam allavattha allakesa idhupasankamanta diva divassa”ti.
ud2.7:4.1: Atha kho bhagava etamattham viditva tayam velayam imam udanam udanesi:
ud2.7:6.1: Ye ve diva ca ratto ca,
